mapper.sql: MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_CODE, MENU_URL, MENU_SORT, MENU_LEVEL, PARENT_MENU_CODE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, STATUS_DATE
mapper.select: SELECT m.* FROM SYS_MENU m LEFT JOIN SYS_PERMISSION_MENU_REL pmr ON pmr.MENU_CODE = m.MENU_CODE LEFT JOIN SYS_PERMISSION p ON p.PERMISSION_CODE = pmr.PERMISSION_CODE LEFT JOIN SYS_ROLE_PERMISSION_REF rpr ON rpr.PERMISSION_CODE = p.PERMISSION_CODE LEFT JOIN SYS_ROLE r ON r.ROLE_CODE = rpr.ROLE_CODE left join SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF prr on prr.ROLE_CODE=r.ROLE_CODE left join SYS_USER_POSITION_REF upr on upr.POSITION_CODE=prr.POSITION_CODE LEFT JOIN SYS_USER u ON u.USER_CODE = upr.USER_CODE WHERE m.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND pmr.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND p.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND rpr.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND r.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND prr.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND upr.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND u.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND u.ACCOUT = #{accout}
